salon.name: Beauty Salon
salon.tagline: Transform your look with our expert stylists
salon.description: Professional salon website with booking system and service gallery

hero.title: Luxury Beauty Salon & Spa
hero.subtitle: Transform your look with our expert stylists and premium beauty treatments in a relaxing atmosphere.

about.title: About Our Salon
about.description: With over 15 years of experience, our luxury salon combines traditional techniques with modern innovation to deliver exceptional beauty services.
about.extendedDescription: We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for all our clients. Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted choice in the community.

services.name: Hair Styling
services.description: Professional cuts, colors, and treatments for all hair types

services.name: Nail Care
services.description: Manicures, pedicures, and nail art by certified technicians

services.name: Spa Treatments
services.description: Relaxing facials, massages, and body treatments

services.name: Makeup Services
services.description: Professional makeup for special occasions and events

team.name: Sarah Johnson
team.bio: 15+ years experience in color and cutting

team.name: Maria Garcia
team.bio: Expert in nail art and luxury manicures

packages.name: Bridal Package
packages.description: Complete bridal beauty package including hair, makeup, and nails

packages.name: Spa Day
packages.description: Full day relaxation with massage, facial, and beauty treatments

testimonials.name: Emma Wilson
testimonials.text: Amazing service! The team is professional and the results are outstanding.

testimonials.name: Jessica Brown
testimonials.text: Highly recommend! Great experience and excellent customer service.

faq.question: What are your hours?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Saturday from 9 AM to 6 PM, and Sunday from 10 AM to 4 PM.

faq.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
faq.answer: We accept walk-ins based on availability, but appointments are recommended for guaranteed service.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment apps like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to book your appointment? Contact us today and let us help you look and feel your best.

gym.name: Elite Fitness Center
gym.tagline: Achieve your fitness goals with expert guidance
gym.description: Modern gym website with membership plans and class schedules

hero.title: Elite Fitness Center
hero.subtitle: Achieve your fitness goals with state-of-the-art equipment, expert trainers, and motivating group classes.

about.title: About Our Gym
about.description: We're committed to helping you reach your fitness potential with personalized training programs and a supportive community.
about.extendedDescription: We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for all our members. Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted choice in the community.

services.name: Personal Training
services.description: One-on-one sessions with certified fitness professionals

services.name: Group Classes
services.description: High-energy classes including HIIT, yoga, and spin

services.name: Strength Training
services.description: Complete weight room with modern equipment

services.name: Yoga & Pilates
services.description: Mind-body classes for flexibility and core strength

team.name: Mike Thompson
team.bio: Former athlete with 10+ years training experience

team.name: David Wilson
team.bio: Sports nutrition specialist and wellness coach

packages.name: Premium Membership
packages.description: Full access to all facilities and unlimited classes

packages.name: Basic Membership
packages.description: Gym access with limited class participation

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.text: Amazing gym with excellent trainers. Lost 20 pounds in 3 months!

testimonials.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The yoga classes are fantastic and the facility is always clean.

faq.question: What are your operating hours?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Friday 5 AM to 11 PM, Saturday 6 AM to 10 PM, and Sunday 7 AM to 9 PM.

faq.question: Do you offer trial memberships?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial for new members to experience all our facilities and classes.

faq.question: Are personal trainers included?
faq.answer: Personal training sessions are available for an additional fee. All our trainers are certified professionals.

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.description: Ready to begin your fitness journey? Contact us to schedule a tour and start your free trial.

restaurant.name: Bella Vista Restaurant
restaurant.tagline: Authentic Italian cuisine in elegant setting
restaurant.description: Elegant restaurant website with menu and table reservations

hero.title: Bella Vista Restaurant
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic Italian cuisine crafted with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes in an elegant setting.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Family-owned for three generations, we bring authentic Italian flavors to your table using recipes passed down through our family.
about.extendedDescription: We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for all our guests. Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted choice in the community.

services.name: Fine Dining
services.description: Authentic Italian dishes made with imported ingredients

services.name: Wine Selection
services.description: Curated collection of Italian and international wines

services.name: Private Events
services.description: Special occasions and corporate events catering

services.name: Wood-Fired Pizza
services.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizzas from our wood-fired oven

packages.name: Family Style Dinner
packages.description: Traditional family-style Italian dinner for groups

testimonials.name: Robert Williams
testimonials.text: Exceptional authentic Italian cuisine. The pasta is made fresh daily and the wine selection is outstanding.

testimonials.name: Sophie Anderson
testimonials.text: Feels like dining in Italy! The atmosphere and food transport you to the heart of Tuscany.

faq.question: Do you accept reservations?
faq.answer: Yes, we highly recommend making reservations, especially for dinner service and weekends. You can book online or call us directly.

faq.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. Please inform us of any allergies when making your reservation.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: We offer complimentary valet parking in the evenings and have a public parking structure nearby.

contact.title: Make a Reservation
contact.description: Experience authentic Italian dining at its finest. Reserve your table today for an unforgettable culinary journey.

faq.question: What is your typical project timeline?
faq.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope, typically 1-6 weeks for most projects. I provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
faq.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing support and maintenance packages for all projects. This includes updates, bug fixes, and content changes.

faq.question: What are your payment terms?
faq.answer: I typically require 50% upfront and 50% upon completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payments.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.
